name: Judas' Trial
description:
Judas made his decision to turn Jesus in, he thought it's the right thing to do, but his heart was screaming noooooooo. That's probably why he passed out at the Last Supper and had a dream. 

In the dream, Judas is told that he's in his own body which is a reflection of his soul. As he walks through his body to find a way back to the supper table, Judas meets some challenges. While he's trying to find solutions to the challenges in the dream, Judas happens to rethink the challenges he met outside the dream.

Will Judas get through the trials and tribulations he's facing? Can his free trial in the dream help him not to pay the price outside the dream? Shall he make the right decision and manage to escape from his fate - a trial before the history? 

That's all up to you. 

In this first-person adventure game, you will act as Judas who's in a weird dream and trying every means to find a way to the happy ending.

Inspired by the musical Jesus Christ Superstar and the film The Last Temptation of Christ.

Key Features
  • No in app purchases, no advertisements, no donations. It is totally free, and will always be free!
  • You can enjoy investigating, analyzing and making decisions in the game, and the choices you make do have game-changing consequences.
  • Tired of making choices? There's also other solution for you to elbow your way to the happy ending.    
  • No violence included. Though there're "enemies" in the game, but you're not going to kill them. Instead, you'll have a chance to know them, to help them, and to be helped by them.
How to Play
  • Download the zip file below, extract it, and double-click "Judas' Trial.exe" to run the game. 
  • You can resize the game window by just dragging the edge in Windowed Mode. However, the default 1920*1080 and Fullscreen Mode is highly recommended.
  • Some of the enemies will chase and hit you if you're in their sight no matter if you're talking with a npc or pausing to take a break. Watch out, and find a safe place or hide behind a shelter before talking or pausing.
  • Controls:

           -   W A S D:  Move

           -   LEFT SHITF + W A S D:  Run

           -   SPACE:  Jump

           -   TAB:  Map

           -   ENTER / LEFT-CLICK:  Continue Conversation

           -   ESC:  Pause Menu

Early Access

This is an early access game. If you have any feedback you'd like to share, please feel free to leave comments below or email me.  All responces are appreciated, and will help me in improving the full game.
